000: On the east bank of the river there is this old signal next to the track.
001: From this side you have to walk across a long bridge before you get to the main bridge.
002: This is the main bridge, it has an arch. Behind the main bridge is the verticle lift-bridge.
003: On the picture above the bridge-keepers guardhouse. Not really comfortable now the windows are gone.
004: The view on the bridge from the house.
005: The meter indicates there is no pressure.
006: The machines were made by Frans Smulders (?) from Utrecht-Holland
